segments.text: Hello ! How can I help you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to take out a loan for school . What kind of interest rate do you offer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you qualify for any of the Federal loan programs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I need to borrow some more money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . In that case we can offer you a private educational loan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do I go about taking it out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just fill out this application . We can let you know right away if you qualify .
segments.speaker: S1
